title: Moonsters
description: A creative puzzle game made with Javascript and WebGL, showcasing innovative uses of web technology. Guide cute monster characters through challenging levels by manipulating the environment. Features unique mechanics and a charming visual style with impressive lighting and particle effects.
how_to_play: Use mouse or touch controls to interact with the game world. Click or tap to select and move objects, solve puzzles, and help the Moonsters navigate through each level. Each puzzle requires creative thinking and understanding of the game's physics-based mechanics.
